articles.author: Lamiat Sabin
articles.title: Feltham fire: 70 firefighters tackling large blaze metres from homes in west London
articles.description: The smoke could be seen from passengers on planes about to land at nearby Heathrow Airport
articles.content:
About 70 firefighters have been called to the scene of an outdoor fire in Feltham, west London, just metres away from peoples homes.
Trees, hedges, plants, and garden decking have been burning behin… [+1200 chars]

articles.author: Nadine White
articles.title: The Commonwealth Games are rooted in slavery – it’s time to axe them
